item.description:
Something fun to do on this rainy night!  8 pm - 1 am   Live DJ and dance floor.  Large bar area.  I will go early to get a small table to serve as our "base" area but it will be pretty much mix and mingle.  I don't dance myself (but I'll wiggle in my chair!) but will enjoy watching the rest of you!  I met the DJ and have heard great things about him - he adapts to the audience, plays a good mix, etc.

They also have a full menu there now and everything I have tried had been really good!

When you turn in to the office park area go straight back towards the lake - the hotel is along the lakeside.  The bar/restaurant is to the far LEFT if you are facing the building..

I will score some seats ALONG THE WINDOWS... come early to help save them if you want to!
item.how_to_find_us: Used to be called the Lord Wakefield Hotel. Right off the exit across from the car dealership - ON the lake! I'll wear a sparky purple shirt and jeans
item.name: Dance Party in Wakefield - Right of I-95 (exit 39) - no cover
